ai-patthana18.21:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.21:0.3_0: persuading the shade of the fetters, etc., six causes and conditions for covering the sake of their (performed),
ai-patthana18.21:1.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.21:2.1_0: for function, not for the sake of fun, conditions doesn’t give rise to the cause.
ai-patthana18.21:3.1_0: for the sake of misery, for the sake of flood, not for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana18.21:4.1_0: Because of this, for the sake of the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause,
ai-patthana18.21:4.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana18.21:5.1_0: for the sake of a hindrance arises dependent on the teaching, not for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana18.21:5.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.21:6.1_0: (Only) no longer hope for the next three months, this doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.21:6.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
